name: Good market-ing!
description:
It's fine morning at the Farmer's Market. The sun is shining and customers are having a good time. You old friend and rival has his stall next to yours and, as usual, you two decide to have a little wager. “Let's see who can sell the most produce today!”

Welcome to Good Market-ing!

Gameplay: (Made for Twitch Streaming)

-Once you've logged in, you and your friend can input your names, after which the game starts. (Authorisation key available on twitchapps.com/tmi)

WARNING: Never share your authorisation Key with others!

-You will see the product you want to sell in the bottom middle, and 8 arguments from which you can each choose 2. Any argument you pick will become unavailable to your friend, and vice versa. So choose carefully!

-Then you each have a little bit of time to convince you customers to buy from you, using the two topics you've chosen. Then the voting begins.

-Viewers in chat can now choose who's produce they want to buy, simply by typing “vote [player name]” or “vote 1” / “vote 2” (case-sensitive)

The result will show on screen, and once the time is up, the total amount of sales are counted and whoever sold more gets a point!

-The next produce appears and you the cycle repeats. The player with the most points at the end wins
